LanguageData.XMonsters_StoneSpeed.label: stone speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_StoneSpeed.description: In fact, those with this gene possess such incredible movement speed that they don't even realize it. This gene suppresses the trait associated with slowing movement speed.
LanguageData.XMonsters_SlugSpeed.label: slug speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_SlugSpeed.description: You know, in a way, these mollusks are cute, crawling about their business calmly and not bothering anyone. Their only downsides are that they eat crops and carry all sorts of diseases.
LanguageData.XMonsters_HareSpeed.label: hare speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_HareSpeed.description: This gene gives decent movement speed, superior to some <color=#66c6cc>vanilla genes</color>, and also does not affect metabolism.
LanguageData.XMonsters_CheetahSpeed.label: cheetah speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_CheetahSpeed.description: This gene is superior to the <color=#7f7f59>previous gene</color>. However, it does require metabolism, albeit only slightly.
LanguageData.XMonsters_RacingCarSpeed.label: racing car speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_RacingCarSpeed.description: You call this speed? THIS IS REAL SPEED!!!
LanguageData.XMonsters_SupersonicSpeed.label: supersonic speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperluminalSpeed.label: superluminal speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_SuperluminalSpeed.description: Unfortunately, despite its name, this gene doesn't grant its owner the ability to travel to the stars. And why would they?
LanguageData.XMonsters_DevilSpeed.label: devil speed
LanguageData.XMonsters_DevilSpeed.description: This gene grants devilish speed and suppresses the trait that slows down movement speed.
